ingredients.item: 1 medium Waitrose British Blacktail Free Range Egg, yolk only

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200°C, gas mark 6.

Place the flour, ground almonds, 2 tbsp sugar and 1 tsp cinnamon in a food processor, and blitz. Add the butter and process until you have a breadcrumb-like mix. Add the egg yolk and 2-3 tbsp water, and pulse to give a soft dough. Wrap in clingfilm and chill for 20 minutes.

On a floured surface, roll out the pastry to a 26cm circle and place on a large greased baking tray. Mix the ricotta with the vanilla and remaining ½ tsp cinnamon, and spread over the pastry, leaving a 2cm rim round the edge. Bring up the pastry edges and crimp to enclose the filling. Bake for 20-25 minutes until golden. Cool slightly.
Meanwhile, place the raspberries and cherries in a bowl with the cherry brandy, lemon zest and juice and remaining 1 tbsp sugar, and leave while the pastry is cooking.
Drain the raspberries and cherries, reserving the juice, and scatter over the ricotta. Drizzle with 2 tbsp reserved juice and dust with the icing sugar.
